game_description: A long time ago, the search for an endless source of energy led to a disaster, now the lands around Kurgansk are infected and cursed and the locals have lost their minds. You have fallen into these mad places by mistake and are trying to find your way back, while hundreds of evil monsters stop you from doing it. A stranger helps you by giving out instructions on the walkie-talkie, but can you trust them? Game features: * Huge open and diverse world, completely changing with the onset of the night; * A mesmerizing VR horror game where you can truly experience fear for your life; * A powerful system for crafting weapons and equipment will help you to survive; * Mysteries of the zone will drive you crazy; * Deadly anomalies can lie in wait anywhere; * There is an option to act as a ninja, killing local monsters with W-shaped transformer plates. review_3: I have been on the fence about this for a while but purchased it and I think it has great potential, graphics are pretty decent the only issue I have is texture and object pop in which I hope will be improved over time but I like the cel shaded graphics, the gameplay is great fun although I don't know if it's a bug but I can't seem to fire a gun with my right hand which is very frustrating being right handed so please update, there needs to be some sort of manual height/holster adjustment for comfort and also when I turn it still has comfort setting on even though I disabled it, lastly I think the physics could see some improvements and also more options in the settings to help with comfort and immersion but I do believe after some updates and some fixes this game could be amazing, I do recommend it and I will definitely give it 5 star's once the bugs and improvements have been implemented, overall great game worth the asking price.
